Text: Brian Blain:  He is best remembered for his role as wealthy businessman Gordon Hamilton in the Seven Network soap opera "Sons and Daughters" from 1981 to 1987 when the series was cancelled, and his role as Captain Jacob Hilliard in the film sequel "Return to the Blue Lagoon" (1991).

Text: Brian Blain:  He died of a heart attack in 1994, at the age of 56.
